title: The Adventures of Handyman
creator_credit: AFTRS, Craig Salvin and Martin Murphy
brief_description: A suburban damsel in distress with a blocked sink heralds the arrival of Handyman - mild mannered and silver haired Reg O’Grady who proves that super heroes don’t have a shelf life.
